roleset.name: stare down in cold blood

example.name: both args, concatenated rel
example.text: Haha I like how-1 he ice grilled the cameras after that dunk

roleset.note: ICEGRILL-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS (from icegrill.01-v)
